item.title: Building Efficient Ci/Cd Pipeline with GitHub actions and app engine
item.description: Overview About the example app Getting our hands dirty with the tests Manual Deployment Overview # One of the most important skills to master for becoming an experienced software developer is the automation of the repeatable tasks and I believe the most important one of them is the development process is self which includes merging, testing, and deploying the code and in the article, I want to show to efficiently build a CI/CD pipeline that does all of that
